Articles.Content:
Howdy, thank you for stopping by and trying to help, I really appreciate it.

My game keeps crashing to desktop and I'm at a loss as to why its happening. I experience no other problems and the game runs great up tell the point of the crash.

I'm including links to all the files I have. If I missed something or you need more info please let me know and I'll do what I can to include it.

Mod List https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1pzFz1F4cx8S1pkc2NwYXRhcEk/view?usp=sharing

Output Log https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1pzFz1F4cx8THFtWWJCODkzNFk/view?usp=sharing

DxDiag File https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1pzFz1F4cx8T0lWcENpMFlRTzA/view?usp=sharing

Windows Troubleshoot Info https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1pzFz1F4cx8QmV4b0hrZjlpTHM/view?usp=sharing

Hey, couldn't get it fast out of the files you attached, but do you use open_glmode or dx11=

If not, the crashes are probably because ksp need more memory. This can reduced by forcing to start in openglmode or dx11. I prefer the last one.

Things to do:

  • make sure you run the game as administrator
  • force it to open it in glmode or dx11

here is a link how to do it:

greetings

Edited September 26, 2016 by DrLicor
